tool_description: An API aggregating news articles related to green technology, AI, stocks, start-ups, and trends.
name: Green Gold
title: Green Gold

api_list.name: all articles
api_list.description:
Endpoint to gather all articles from all listed publications detailed in API. 
The data returned from the API is the title of the article, publication name it was sourced from and a link to the article on the publications website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://green-gold.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "green-gold.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: specific publication articles
api_list.description: Gets news articles from specific publications
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://green-gold.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "green-gold.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://green-gold.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "green-gold.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
